Method Detail

getRecordProcess

RecordProcess getRecordProcess()
Get the recordProcess for this record.

Returns:
The interface. An exception is thrown if the record has not been assigned a recordProvcess.

setRecordProcess

void setRecordProcess(RecordProcess recordProcess)
Set the recordProcess for this field. A field can have at most one recordProcess. An exception is thrown if this is called for a record that already has a recordProcess.

Parameters:
recordProcess - The interface.

findPVRecordField

PVRecordField findPVRecordField(org.epics.pvData.pv.PVField pvField)
Find the PVRecordField for the pvField.

Parameters:
pvField - The pvField interface.
Returns:
The PVRecordField interface or null is not in record.

getPVRecordStructure

PVRecordStructure getPVRecordStructure()
Get the top level PVRecordStructure.

Returns:
The PVRecordStructure interface.

getRecordName

java.lang.String getRecordName()
Get the record instance name.

Returns:
The name.

message

void message(java.lang.String message,
             org.epics.pvData.pv.MessageType messageType)
Report a message. The record name will be appended to the message.

Parameters:
message - The message.
messageType - The message type.

addRequester

void addRequester(org.epics.pvData.pv.Requester requester)
Add a requester to receive messages.

Parameters:
requester - The requester to add.

removeRequester

void removeRequester(org.epics.pvData.pv.Requester requester)
Remove a message requester.

Parameters:
requester - The requester to remove.

lock

void lock()
Lock the record instance. This must be called before accessing the record.

unlock

void unlock()
Unlock the record.

lockOtherRecord

void lockOtherRecord(PVRecord otherRecord)
While holding lock on this record lock another record. If the other record is already locked than this record may be unlocked. The caller must call the unlock method of the other record when done with it.

Parameters:
otherRecord - the other record.

beginGroupPut

void beginGroupPut()
Begin a group of related puts.

endGroupPut

void endGroupPut()
End of a group of related puts.

registerListener

void registerListener(PVListener pvListener)
Register a PVListener. This must be called before pvField.addListener.

Parameters:
pvListener - The listener.

unregisterListener

void unregisterListener(PVListener pvListener)
Unregister a PVListener.

Parameters:
pvListener - The listener.

isRegisteredListener

boolean isRegisteredListener(PVListener pvListener)
Is this pvListener registered? This is called by AbstractPVField. addListener.

Parameters:
pvListener - The listener.
Returns:
(false,true) if the listener (is not, is) registered.

removeEveryListener

void removeEveryListener()
Remove every PVListener.

registerClient

void registerClient(PVRecordClient pvRecordClient)
Register a client of the record. This must be called by any code that connects to the record.

Parameters:
pvRecordClient - The record client.

unregisterClient

void unregisterClient(PVRecordClient pvRecordClient)
Unregister a client of the record. This must be called by any code that disconnects from the record.

Parameters:
pvRecordClient - The record client.

detachClients

void detachClients()
Detach all registered clients.

getNumberClients

int getNumberClients()
Get the number of registerd clients.

Returns:
The number.
